entry.title: WIND WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:12 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 1:00 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: WSW 47 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
